'''Beta 1.9 Prerelease 4''' is the fourth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.0.0]], released on October 13, 2011.<ref>{{tweet|jeb_|124491774398963712|Beta 1.9 pre-4! assets.minecraft.net/1_9-pre4/minecraft.jar (and minecraft_server). PS. @notch's dragon is not available yet!|October 13, 2011}}</ref> It adds [[the End]] dimension, the [[ender dragon]], and [[moon]] phases. It also completes the [[enchanting]] mechanics, changes fluid placement using [[bucket]]s, and fixes some bugs.

This version was reuploaded to fix the version number not being updated from the previous pre-release, and the server was reuploaded twice.<ref>{{tweet|jeb_|124493429781704705|Ah gahd why do I always forget something? I forgot to change the version number.... The real version will be up shortly|October 13, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|jeb_|124493891431960576|Pre-release 4 with correct version number: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_9-pre4/minecraft.jar (same URL as before)|October 13, 2011}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:End Stone JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]]''' [[End Stone]]'''
* The white cobblestone texture introduced in the previous pre-release ([[File:End Stone (texture) JE0.png|width=32x32]]) was changed, and this overhauled version is used by end stone.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Glistering Melon Slice JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Glistering Melon]]'''
* Used to brew potions of Healing.
* Crafted with [[gold nugget]] and [[melon slice]].

'''[[File:Uncraftable Splash Potion JE1.png|32px]] [[Splash Potion]]s'''
* [[File:Splash Water Bottle JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Splash Water Bottle]]
* [[File:Splash Water Bottle JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Splash Awkward Potion]]
* [[File:Splash Water Bottle JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Splash Mundane Potion]]
* [[File:Splash Water Bottle JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Splash Thick Potion]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Swiftness JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Swiftness]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Slowness JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Slowness]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Strength JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Strength]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Weakness JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Weakness]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Healing JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Healing]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Harming JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Harming]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Regeneration JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Regeneration]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Fire Resistance JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Fire Resistance]]
* [[File:Splash Potion of Poison JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potion of Poison]]
** Created by brewing [[potion]] with [[gunpowder]].
** Has an area of effect when thrown.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Ender Dragon.gif|64px]] [[Ender Dragon]]'''
* The dragon can pass through all [[block]]s and destroys most of them.
* Present in the code, but unfinished and not normally accessible without mods.

=== World generation ===
'''{{BiomeLink|The End}}'''
* New dimension, accessible through the [[End portal]].
* One island floating in a black void.
* [[Endermen]] spawn here.
* The [[ender dragon]] does not spawn yet.
* A single obsidian platform appears in the center of the island.

'''{{EnvLink|End spike|Obsidian Pillars}}'''
* Generate in [[the End]].

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Enchanting]]'''
* Now fully implemented.
* The maximum enchantment level of the enchantment table is now 50.
* Enchanted items' tooltips now display their enchantments instead of "Enchanted!!".
* Added 17 enchantments.

=== General ===
'''[[Particles (Java Edition)|Particles]]'''
* Added {{code|magicCrit}}, {{code|spell}}, {{code|instantSpell}}, and {{code|mobSpell}}.

'''[[Server.properties]]'''
* New settings:
* <code>debug</code>
* <code>enable-query</code>
* <code>enable-rcon</code>
* <code>query.port</code>
* <code>rcon.password</code>
* <code>rcon.port</code>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Enchanting Table (pre-texture update).gif|32px]] [[Enchantment Table]]'''
* Now named "Enchantment Table" in the inventory.
* Enchantment tables now require [[bookshelves]] to get maximum enchantments, up to level 50 with 30 bookshelves.
* Hoes, flint and steel, and shears can no longer be enchanted using an enchantment table.

'''[[File:End Portal.png|32px]] [[End Portal (block)]]'''
* When an entity makes contact with it, they teleport into [[the End]] or back to the [[Overworld]] respectively now.
* At most 12 eyes of ender to activate.

'''[[File:End Portal Frame (S) JE4.png|32px]] [[File:Filled End Portal Frame (S) JE4.png|32px]] [[End Portal Frame]]'''
* Redesigned graphically.
* Now emits light level of 1

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Eye of Ender JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Eye of Ender]]'''
* Added ability to use with right click to locate a [[stronghold]].

'''[[File:Ghast Tear JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Ghast Tear]]'''
* Now used for potions of Regeneration.

'''[[File:Lava Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Lava Bucket]]'''
* Placing fluids lava with a bucket treats other fluid source blocks like solid blocks, allowing the player to place them on top of each other without an adjacent wall.

'''[[File:Water Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Water Bucket]]'''
* Placing fluids water with a bucket treats other fluid source blocks like solid blocks, allowing the player to place them on top of each other without an adjacent wall.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Cave Spider JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cave Spider]]'''
* Cave spiders are now immune to the [[Poison]] status effect.
* Cave spiders are now considered [[arthropod]]s.

'''[[File:Enderman JE2.png|82px]] [[Enderman]]'''
* Endermen used to burn in sunlight, but as of this update, they instead randomly teleport around until they find a dark spot or despawn eventually. This makes it extremely hard to get close enough to kill them during daytime.

'''[[File:Spider JE3 BE2.png|32px]] [[Spider]]'''
* Cave spiders are now immune to the [[Poison]] status effect.
* Cave spiders are now considered [[arthropod]]s.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Status effect]]s'''
* Added a swirl particle, emitted by players with status effects.

'''[[Sun]] and [[moon]]'''
* Now rise in the east and set in the west, based on the top of maps being north, and are round.
* The moon now has multiple phases, somewhat akin to the real Moon.

'''[[Sky dimension]]'''
* Removed, and was replaced by the End.

=== General ===
'''[[Texture pack]]s'''
* The player can reload the texture pack by pressing {{keys|F3+T}}.

'''[[Skin]]s'''
* All bottom textures of the skin are flipped horizontally.

'''Version number'''
* Is no longer displayed, unless {{Keys|F3}} is pressed.

== Removals ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Glass Pillar.png|2px]] [[Java_Edition_removed_features#Stronghold glass pillars|Glass pillars]]'''
* No longer generate to mark the position of [[stronghold]]s.

== Fixes ==
'''5 bugs fixed'''
* Enchanting is now server-side instead of being only a client-side change.
* Fixed {{key|Shift}} + click crash bug with enchanting tables and brewing stands.
* Critical hits now appear in multiplayer.
* Glass towers stretching to the top of the map no longer appear over strongholds.
* Fixed all [[minecart with furnace]] bugs, except the lighting bug.</onlyinclude>
